mods.abstract: Image of a music student Russ Lackey holding a guitar and leaning on a table, with his arm resting on a piano to his left. He is looking at Oscar Peterson. Peterson is also leaning on the table while gesturing into the distance with his right arm.
mods.accessCondition: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca
